params.text:
6. Fill in the missing words from the options given in the bracket below.

(Motherboard, RAM, Printer, CPU, Monitor)

questions:
a. The *monitor* shows whatever you do on the computer.

b. In *motherboard*, all the parts are connected.

c. The *RAM* stores information temporarily.

d.  The *CPU* is known as the brain of the computer.

e. A *printer* is an output device which prints the output on paper.

params.taskDescription:
Drag the words into the correct boxes of the following conversations. 

Example: Computer: I'm very fast.

                  Man: I cannot work as fast as you can.

overallFeedback.feedback: Very poor !! Need to study more.

params.resetDropDescription: Are you sure you want to reset this drop zone?
params.a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
params.a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
params.a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
params.textField:
a) Computer: I'm always *accurate*. I'm never wrong.
Man: I make *mistakes* sometimes.

b) Computer: I can do many *works* at the same time. I'm 
             versatile.
Man: I cannot do many tasks at the same time.

c) Man: I am capable of making my own *decisions*.
Computer: I *cannot* make my own decisions. 

d) Man: I *don't need* instructions to do my work. 
Computer: I *need* instructions to work.

params.textField:
INPUT DEVICES
*Mouse*: pointing device      
*Joystick*: helps play games 
*Keyboard*: typing device     
*Touchpad*: pointing device   
*Microphone*: records voice/ sounds 


​OUTPUT DEVICES
*Monitor*: displays pictures
*Speakers*: produce sound
*Printer*: printing device
*Scanner*: scans documents and pictures
*Projector*: helps to watch movies
